item.title: Configure Function Keys Keychron on Linux
item.description: #how-to #os/linux #tech/hardware hold for 4 seconds fn + X + L in a terminal execute and test the function keys 1 echo 0 | sudo tee /sys/module/hid_apple/parameters/fnmode and then this, to make it permanent 1 2 echo "options hid_apple fnmode=0" | sudo tee -a /etc/modprobe.
